polls.question: What is your native language? (The list contains 100 languages, sorted by the number of native speakers according to Wikipedia)
polls.answers: Mandarin (entire branch)--|--Spanish--|--English--|--Hindi--|--Arabic--|--Portuguese--|--Bengali--|--Russian--|--Japanese--|--Punjabi--|--German--|--Javanese--|--Wu (inc. Shanghainese)--|--Malay (inc. Indonesian and Malaysian)--|--Telugu--|--Vietnamese--|--Korean--|--French--|--Marathi--|--Tamil--|--Urdu--|--Turkish--|--Italian--|--Yue (inc. comments.body: In ZN, we can setup a new site with just few clicks, so there is no technical reason to keep all the stuff in the same place. I think, big web portals make little sense in ZN.

Looks like the list in Wikipedia wasn't accurate. I've just noticed there is no Bulgarian in it. Bulgarian is spoken by more than 8 million people, so I guess it should be in the list. Maybe some other quite widely spoken languages are missing as well. Sorry, guys, it wasn't intentional.
